article_title: A Ballroom on Ice in New York City
article_text: News Corp is a network of leading companies in the worlds of diversified media, news, education, and information services.

twitter.description: Fans of ice dancing and formal attire got a chance to show off their ballroom skills on the ice this week. Attendees of the sixth annual Ice Ball, presented by The Simulacrum of Yore Society, skated in "Impressionist Formal" attire at the Bryant Park ice skating rink on Wednesday.
twitter.title: A Ballroom on Ice in New York City
